S.FORM: 11 Ph'ei-kame wæ'i k'atta ki paoul-ian ka mams-ing
12 Atta-ral-a ki kæu-ittingen-hou ymiæn-an, mama ka attaral-kame ta ymi-æn ki kæu-itting-'niæn.
13 Ka inei-kame dmyllough tou repung-an, râ haoumi-ei-kame ki Littou. Ka a'mouhou ta Pei-sasou-an, ta pei-lpoug-han, ta keirang-en ki kidi tou yhkaquan myd-darynnough, Amen.
14 Ka dou atta-ral-kamou ki kaeuloung ki ni-tau-rahei-en neid, dou-mia-ka attaral-al-appa ymoumi-æn ta Raraman-noumi ka tou tounnoun ki vullu-vullum.
15 Irou râ assi-kamou atta-ral ki kaeu-loung ki ni-tau-rahei-en nein, dou-miaka assi atta-ral-ah ta Raraman-oumi ki ni-tau-rahei-anoumi.

16 Ka rou mi-rkud-kamou, ynna massau-voulas ma-ma ki paninni-en ki rÿh ki sou: ka pa-rummang ki vlung nein, alei ka mahauei-ah ki kaeuloung mama kimi-rarkud-da. Missing koun-naukamou, ka ni-mar'ato ki ni-ou-vavarg-han nein.
17 Râ ymhou tou 'irarikdden-hou tib-boulou-â ki voungo-'ho, padioup-pau ta moula oho.
